definition: To transfer possession or control of something to someone else, typically by physically handing it over or delivering it. This word is commonly used when referring to giving or passing an object, document, or responsibility from one person to another.

examples.english: I hand over the book to you.

examples.german: Der Arzt überweist den Patienten an einen Spezialisten.
examples.english: The doctor refers the patient to a specialist.

examples.german: Der Chef übergibt die Aufgabe an seinen Stellvertreter.
examples.english: The boss delegates the task to his deputy.
